addr: 5855 W. Century Blvd. Los Angeles, CA
title: Harris/Goode Family Reunion
desc: Attention Harris/Goode Family: The time has come for us to meet again to remember?our past, enjoy our present and prepare for our future. Your planning committee has an EXPLOSIVE?weekend in store for you?and we look forward to seeing all of you!!! Family Reunion Agenda: Meet & Greet Friday- 7:00 p.m. - Until LA Marriott Hotel Attendees to pick up their registration packets and T-Shirts *Heavy appetizers will be served* Family Picnic Saturday- 10:00 a.m.- 5:00 p.m. Del Aire Park Food, games and fun ? Church Sunday- 10:00 a.m.- 1:00 p.m. ? Family Banquet/ Dinner   Sunday 6:00 p.m. - Midnight Includes a three course meal Monday is FREE DAY! Hotel and Travel Accommodations Each attendee is responsible for making their own hotel accommodations. Please contact the Marriott Directly at 1-800-228-9290 and book under HARRIS/GOODE family reunion for our group rate of $139.00.? All reservations by attendees MUST be received on or before June 17, 2016 in order to secure the group rate.?? (Hotel Registration will be available November 16, 2015.)  Each attendee is responsible for making their own travel arrangements. Please plan early to avoid an increase in airline tickets. ? FAQs What are my transport/parking options getting to the event? There is a hotel shuttle that will pick you up and drop you off at the airport.? There is also a Hertz Rental car on site for your convenience. ? Is my registration/ticket transferrable? No and there are no refunds. Where can I contact the organizer with any questions? Jamilla Harris, 562-706-7623
